implementation_timeline.action_items: Finalize job descriptions and publish all STEM Academy positions on district and external job boards.
Hiring committee reviews applications, screens for qualifications, and selects candidates for first interviews.
Conduct first-round interviews (March 25-April 5) with candidates selected from initial application review.
Conduct second-round interviews (April 15-20) with top candidates advancing from the first round.
Hiring committee makes final selection of candidates for all positions; reference checks completed.
Extend official offers of employment and issue contracts to selected candidates.
Conduct orientation (August 1-5) for new STEM Academy staff covering program goals, policies, and curriculum.
STEM Academy officially opens and begins instruction for the inaugural student cohort.
